name: TitTok
description:
TitTok - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws!


The player's goal is to complete all levels and not die from the attacks of evil enemies.
You can find bombs in the levels and use them anywhere!

▪ Kitties ^. ^
▪ 31 levels;
▪ Platformer levels;
▪ Levels with puzzles;
▪ Diverse and evil enemies;
▪ Spinning deadly saws;
▪ Bombs and explosions;
▪ Destruction;
▪ Double jumps;
▪ Portals;
▪ Mask mode;
▪ Leaderboards and statistics;
▪ 69 Achievements;
▪ Boss Helicopter!

...And in the game you can MEOW at any time ^^
And remember: "Tit before your Tok!"
